resources.string: If you change language. The game would go back to main screen.
Create fog for 1 cell. Fog makes the enemy does not know the outcome of the bullet just shot. The fog will automatically clear after being shot.
If the enemy hits the bomb, the opponent is hit in the same box again.
Prohibit the opponent from shooting 1 time.
Unlock the set of spaceship ships.
Scan a box to see if there is an object in it.
Allows players to move any ship to a random position (mandatory ship has not been shot).
Lets protect 9 cells from 1 shot. It only takes 1 hit to cover all 9 cells.
Scan 9 boxes (cross) to see if there are any objects there. If 9 items have at least 1 item, the radar returns a YES signal.
Ship 4 drops the aircraft, allowing the player to drop bombs (the remaining ship number of ships 4 minus 1) the option box. After using the spell, the head of ship 4 will explode.
Repair 1 box of the ship (does not apply to ships that have been completely destroyed.
You can shoot consecutively if your shot hits an enemy ship.
Put bomb on a ship, When that ship is hit, the whole ship will explode (ship 4 will explode even hit only 1 umbrella) but in return will explode an area corresponding to the ship.
Get at random 1 enemy spell possessing.
Doubled exp received at the end of the match. If in the battle using this spell, nothing happens.
Hit an object with an object on the map, piercing through both shield and fog. Using this spell will end the turn.
Sacrifice your own ship to destroy similar ships on the enemy side.
Revive the ship at another random location.
Using this spell will allow you to use 3 random spells (of unlocked spells) in 3 random locations.
Explode everything on an optional row.
Reach the level to get the item.
Your name can not be null and can not over 20 character.
